name: Adventurer Manager
description: Reunite the kingdom of Adventuria and defeat the evil Illusionist Miraj by recruiting Adventurers to send on Adventures for epic loot and rewards in this RPG/Management Sim with tons of depth, randomization, and customization options!
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP or later Processor: 1.8GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Direct3D/OpenGL compatible card with at least 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: 2d sound compatible card
